accounts.name: protocol_config
docs: Protocol config account to close - using AccountInfo to avoid deserialization

accounts.name: authority
docs: The authority that should match the one stored in the account

accounts.name: receiver
docs: Receiver of the rent (can be the authority or another account)

accounts.name: dummy_account
docs: Simple initialization for testing - just log a message

accounts.name: warden
docs: The warden account to migrate - using AccountInfo to avoid deserialization errors

accounts.name: authority
docs: The warden's authority must sign to authorize this migration
Only the warden owner can migrate their own account

accounts.name: submitter
docs: Either seeker or warden can submit proofs

accounts.name: authority
docs: The protocol authority must sign to authorize this change.

accounts.name: warden
docs: The warden account to be updated.

errors.name: ExcessiveBandwidth
errors.msg: Bandwidth amount exceeds maximum allowed per proof

errors.name: ProofTooOld
errors.msg: Proof is too old and cannot be accepted

errors.name: AnomalousBandwidth
errors.msg: Bandwidth claim appears anomalous and may be fraudulent

errors.name: Ed25519InstructionNotFound
errors.msg: Ed25519Program instruction not found at expected index

errors.name: InvalidEd25519Instruction
errors.msg: Instruction is not an Ed25519Program instruction

errors.name: InvalidEd25519Data
errors.msg: Ed25519Program instruction data is invalid or too short

errors.name: SignatureMismatch
errors.msg: Signature in Ed25519 instruction doesn't match expected signature

errors.name: PublicKeyMismatch
errors.msg: Public key in Ed25519 instruction doesn't match expected public key

errors.name: MessageMismatch
errors.msg: Message in Ed25519 instruction doesn't match expected message

types.name: WardenPeerIdMigrated
docs: Event emitted when a Warden's PeerId is successfully migrated

fields.name: old_length
docs: The incorrect length that was stored before migration
